message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. Let me know if this works for you.

Given the current situation, I believe a fair division would be equal shares for both parties. I propose splitting the $10000 evenly at $5000 each. This should ensure mutual satisfaction and prevent further negotiations leading to lower values due to inflation.
